data.title: Careers at Seattle Children's Research Institute
data.meta_description: Seattle Children's Research Institute fosters a cutting edge academic environment supporting multidisciplinary research, collaboration and professional development. Learn about our programs.
data.text:
Careers, Educational and Training Opportunities

One of the greatest resources we have is our people, who are among the world's best and brightest in their fields.

Seattle Children’s fosters a cutting-edge academic environment supporting multidisciplinary research, collaboration and professional development.

We also provide students and trainees of all levels with meaningful experiences that enhances their skills and allows them to explore their interest in health sciences research.
